### desired_STD

>  desired_STD (coefficients:<built-infunctionarray>, pca_mean:<built-
>                   infunctionarray>, scores:<built-infunctionarray>,
>                   pca_index:int, k:int)

*This function explains how much the data will change along specific pc
by standard deviation.*
